MICAFIL outdoor transformer bushings are the product of a sophisticated design using a small number of components: an insulating body, main flange, insulator shell, and current conductor.​
​
They are produced in a wide variety of designs and thus can easily fulfill specific customer requirements.​
​
MICAFIL outdoor transformer bushings are completely dry, explosion-proof, and fire-resistant, allowing high application temperatures.
Our sales team will get in touch with you
